description: Potential unsafe dataflow issue in `<collections::swiss_table::table::ArchivedHashTable<T> as bytecheck::CheckBytes<__C>>::check_bytes`
code_snippet:
derive(bytecheck::CheckBytes),
    bytecheck(verify)
)]
#[rkyv(crate)]
#[repr(C)]
pub struct ArchivedHashTable<T> {
    ptr: RawRelPtr,
    len: ArchivedUsize,
    cap: ArchivedUsize,
    _phantom: PhantomData<T>,
}
